content.html: We now have the playbook of how not to acquire a company, even when your goal is to cut costs. Nothing wrong with wanting to cut costs. A little empathy and planning would have gone a long way. And some - dare I say - leadership that motivates people positively?
content.value:
We now have the playbook of how not to acquire a company, even when your goal is to cut costs.

Nothing wrong with wanting to cut costs.

A little empathy and planning would have gone a long way. And some - dare I say - leadership that motivates people positively?
